footballapi.title: FootballAPI
footballapi.descr: A fast, restful API providing football statistics (players, clubs, stadiums), written in Go with no external libraries, utilizing Go's concurrency features for fast response times. It also features a UI built in React.

lapisoauth.title: LapisOAuth
lapisoauth.descr: A partial OAuth-like Authentication System, created with Go and Postgres for backend, React for frontend. Implements modern cryptographic techniques for password hashing and provides clear instructions for integration.

e-comm.title: E-commerce Website
e-comm.descr: An e-commerce website built with Node.js, React, and PostgreSQL. It utilizes Node and PostgreSQL for a scalable backend, while React ensures a smooth and beautiful frontend experience.

lapisblog.title: LapisBlog
lapisblog.descr: A social network platform allowing anonymous or identifiable interactions with posts. Built with Go and Postgres for backend, frontend undecided (possibly Svelte), focusing on privacy and user control over interactions.

transpohub.title: Transpohub
transpohub.descr: A freelance platform for transporters to connect with clients for jobs, created as a group project using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. It aims to improve transportation facilities in the user's country.
